original_title: Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan: Moon Water
overview: The Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan performs their elegant Tai Chi-based dances to the music of J.S. Bach. Choreography by Lin Hwai-Min. This dance film examines the correlation between essence and appearance, effort and effortlessness, man and woman , all explored using water, mirror, light and reflections.
title: Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan: Moon Water
